type1_missing.reasoning: Statistics Bar showing total tasks count, completed tasks count, and completion percentage is completely missing from dashboard
Client-side password validation (minimum 6 characters) is missing from registration page - only name and email are validated client-side
Client-side email format validation is missing from login page - only HTML5 required attribute is used

type2_incorrect.reasoning: Task title validation allows maximum 50 characters instead of specified 100 characters
Tasks are sorted by creation date in ascending order (oldest first) instead of newest first as specified
Session expiry is set to current time with no actual 7-day expiry calculated - sessions expire immediately instead of after 7 days
Error response format in auth endpoints uses simple string format {error: 'message'} instead of specified nested structure {error: {code: 'CODE', message: 'message'}}
User name displayed in dashboard header uses mock data ('User') instead of actual user data from session/database
Session cookie missing maxAge property for 7-day expiry - only server-side expiresAt should be checked, cookie itself should have maxAge

type3_extraneous.reasoning: Admin dashboard page with user statistics table not mentioned anywhere in specification
Priority selection dropdown (low/medium/high) for tasks not mentioned in specification - spec only requires title input
Priority indicator display with color coding not mentioned in specification - task items should only show checkbox, title, and delete button
Bulk operation functions clearCompletedTasks, deleteAllTasks, and toggleAllTasks are implemented but not required by specification and never used
